turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like you to order some pizzas for my family for dinner from Dominos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, which Dominos do you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order from the closest one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, so we are going to order 2 pizzas. The first one will be a pan pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great, what size pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok for the first one, let's make it a medium with beef and pineapples.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what kind of beef, the meatballs or the cheesesteak.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it the meatballs. And put extra on there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great is that all for the first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes and for the second pizza, make it thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great thin crust and what would you like on that pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's make it black olives and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, a medium as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what kind of sauce on those, just the traditional ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And that's it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, just to confirm, you want two pizzas. Both medium sized, with traditional sauce. The first with meatballs and pineapples, with a pan crust and the second, also a medium, with thin crust and black olives and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And would you like these delivered or for pick up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We'll pick them up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, the pizzas have been ordered and they will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, great, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent via text message to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thanks again.
